meanings.definition: The quality or state of being demure.
meanings.sent1: Her demurenesses in class made her a favorite among the teachers.
meanings.sent2: Her demurenesses at the party caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The demurenesses of the kitten as it played with a ball of yarn was quite endearing.
meanings.sent4: The demurenesses of the forest in the early morning mist gave it a mysterious aura.
meanings.sent5: The demurenesses of the painting captured the artist's delicate touch.

meanings.definition: The act or practice of being demure.
meanings.sent1: His demurenesses during the meeting impressed his colleagues.
meanings.sent2: The actress's demurenesses on stage added to her charm.
meanings.sent3: The demurenesses of the squirrel as it hid its acorn stash was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The demurenesses of the clouds as they drifted lazily across the sky was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The demurenesses of the child's apology melted everyone's hearts.

meanings.definition: The behavior or demeanor of being demure.
meanings.sent1: The demurenesses of her smile hinted at a hidden mischief.
meanings.sent2: His demurenesses in front of his crush were quite adorable.
meanings.sent3: The demurenesses of the penguin as it waddled across the ice made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The demurenesses of the old house gave it a quaint and charming appeal.
meanings.sent5: The demurenesses of the melody brought a sense of calm to the listeners.
